name: IMAX Corporation
description: IMAX Corporation is a global leader in the entertainment technology industry, specializing in immersive cinematic experiences. Founded in 1967, IMAX has revolutionized the way audiences experience films, providing an unparalleled level of visual and auditory engagement. The company designs and manufactures high-resolution, large-format projection systems, and operates a network of IMAX theaters worldwide. IMAX's proprietary technology enhances the viewing experience by showcasing films in a uniquely immersive format, featuring crystal-clear images and powerful sound that transport viewers into the heart of the story. The company has partnered with major film studios to produce and distribute blockbuster films and documentaries in IMAX format, significantly elevating the cinematic experience for audiences. In addition to its theater operations, IMAX is involved in the creation of original content, collaborating with filmmakers to develop films that take full advantage of its innovative technology. With a commitment to pushing the boundaries of film and entertainment, IMAX continues to expand its presence in the global market, while focusing on enhancing customer engagement and driving innovation in film production and distribution.
headquarters: New York City, New York, USA
